name: Vampire Hunter (itch) (Jakub_Vojak)
description:
This game was made for Minijam #118 Vampires!

We took inspiration from Vampire Survivors-like games and made our own version in a 3D world. You as a Vampire Hunter goal is to eliminate all Vampires and restore peace in our World! You were granted with special powers that will help you on your journey, Good Luck!

Controls: 

Move - WSAD

Activate Abillities - LMB, RMB

Items:

Bolt: Shoot arrow in front of player (Manual)

Crossbow: Automatic turret shooting bolts (Auto)

Cross: AOE damage around player (AOE)

Garlic: AOE throwable (Manual)

Stake: Melee stab in front (Automatic)

Dual Blades: Melee on both sides of the player (Automatic)

Credits:

Thank you everyone for Joining this Game Jam and doing your best!
